Make no mistake: Republicans will use every trick possible to gut safety net programs to fund their huge tax cuts for the rich. We can’t let that happen.
Today is a pivotal election and one of the most important elections in a generation. Be bold. Make your voices heard. The world is watching us.
Resist. PERSIST! And VOTE today!

Our nation was founded for “We The People.”

But if we, the people, don’t vote, the powerful win out. You have a duty — a responsibility.

So get out the door, and Walk, Run, Roll or Drive. But get to the poll and VOTE!

Raining? Take an umbrella.

A long line? Take a book.
